Anarchic Strike.name: Anarchic Strike
Anarchic Strike.flavor: Raw chaos flows into your weapon as you strike, inflicting your foe with a temporary battle madness.
Anarchic Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. You slide the target 3 squares, and it makes a melee basic attack as a free action against an enemy you choose. The attack gains a +2 power bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll.

Chaos Breach.name: Chaos Breach
Chaos Breach.flavor: You fling a creature through a chaos breach in the aftermath of your attack, temporarily shunting it off the battlefield, then controlling its movement once it returns.
Chaos Breach.effect: You choose one creature hit by the attack, then fling that creature through a chaos breach. That creature is removed from play. At the start of your next turn, it reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 squares of you that isnâ€™t hindering terrain. In addition, the target is subjected to a chaos distortion (save ends). Until the distortion ends, when the target ends its turn within 5 squares of you, you can teleport it 5 squares to another square within 5 squares of you as a free action.

Chaos Unbound.name: Chaos Unbound
Chaos Unbound.flavor: As you are pressed in combat, you channel chaos to infect all those around you.
Chaos Unbound.trigger: You are bloodied by an attack
Chaos Unbound.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. When any creature within the zone makes an attack roll, a skill check, an ability check, or a saving throw, roll a d4. If you roll an odd number, subtract the result from the triggering die roll. If you roll an even number, add the result.
